V03vinv05_u:444: so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate jñātīnāṃ vā jñātipūjā na kriyate tāvat tvayā tasmai muṇḍakāya śramaṇakāyāgrapiṇḍakaṃ dattam* /

V03vinv05_u:447: tasya (MSV IV 178) karmaṇo vipākenāyam ayoguḍaṃ bhakṣayati /
V03vinv05_u:448: nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni mama preṣayanti /
V03vinv05_u:450: sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati /
V03vinv05_u:452: kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayatheti /
V03vinv05_u:454: na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ api tu praṇītāny eva praheṇakāni preṣayāmaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:456: vadhūke mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmākaṃ lūhāny upanāmayasi /
V03vinv05_u:458: kiṃ na svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati yāhaṃ tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayāmīti /
V03vinv05_u:459: iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati /

V03vinv05_u:467: dārike mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāny upanāmayasi /

V03vinv05_u:1021: yasya vātaśoṇitaṃ bhavati tena rajjupādukā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1022: yadā śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ pravrajitas tadā pādataleṣu suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi caturaṃgulamātrāṇi ṣaḍvargikair dṛṣṭāni /
V03vinv05_u:1024: eṣa tāvan navanītapiṇḍaḥ ekāntaghaṭane śāsane kiṃ pravrajya kariṣyati /
V03vinv05_u:1029: katamo bhadantānanda ekāntaghaṭanaḥ samādhir ukto bhagavatā /
V03vinv05_u:1032: tasya caṃkramataḥ svarṇavarṇāni romāṇi caturaṃgulamātrāṇi śīrṇāni /
V03vinv05_u:1034: sa yāvad ekasmāc caṃkramaśiraso 'paraṃ gacchati tāvat tasyaikasmin (MSV IV 203)
V03vinv05_u:1036_0: dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanto jīvantas tiṣṭhanto dhriyamāṇā yāpayantaḥ kālena
V03vinv05_u:1036_1: kālaṃ nadīcārikāṃ caranti vistareṇa yāvad evāsmiṃs tv arthe buddho bhagavān vihāracārikāṃ
V03vinv05_u:1039: dṛṣṭvā ca punar jānakāḥ pṛcchakā buddhā bhagavanto jānantaḥ pṛcchanti /
V03vinv05_u:1040: pṛcchati buddho bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam ekāntaghaṭakasya bhikṣoś caṃkramam* /
V03vinv05_u:1042: tasmād ānanda anujānāmi śroṇena koṭīviṃśena ekapalāśikā upānahā dhārayitavyā na dvipuṭī na tripuṭī /
V03vinv05_u:1043: sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavati argalakaṃ datvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1046: yat khalv āyuṣman śroṇa jānīthāḥ śāstrā te ekapalāśikopānahā anujñātā na dvipuṭīti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1050: saced ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi syān me atonidānaṃ sabrahmacāriṇo vaktāraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1051: prabhūtaṃ tatra śroṇakoṭīviṃśena pravrajyāvāptaṃ yaś campām asādhāraṇāṃ saptahastikāṃ cānīkam apahāya pravrajitaḥ sa idānīm upānahakalpamātre saktaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1052: api tu yadi bhagavān (MSV IV 204) samāgamya sarvasaṃghasyānujānīyād evam ahaṃ dhārayeyam* /
V03vinv05_u:1053: etat prakaraṇam āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato vistareṇārocayati /
V03vinv05_u:1055: tasmād anujānāmi śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam āgamya sarvasaṃghenaikapalāśikopānahā dhārayitavyā na dvipuṭīti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1056: anyatamo mahallo bhagavataḥ purastāt sopānatkaś caṃkramati /
V03vinv05_u:1057: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣum idam avocat* /
V03vinv05_u:1058: apehi bhikṣo mā me puratas tiṣṭha /
V03vinv05_u:1060: yas tāvad asau bhikṣavaḥ śāstā sarvalokāmiṣasaṃmṛṣṭo bhavati tasya tāvac chāstuḥ śrāvakā naiva laghu laghv eva pātakavratam āpadyante /
V03vinv05_u:1063: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ upānahau dhārayanti tasmān na bhikṣuṇā upānahā dhārayitavyā iti /
V03vinv05_u:1077: na paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣuṃ vinā vāditreṇa nṛtyantam* /
V03vinv05_u:1079: jānakā pṛcchakā buddhā bhagavanto jānantaḥ pṛcchanti /
V03vinv05_u:1080: pṛcchati buddho bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣuṃ kim abhiprāyeṇa bhikṣo evaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv05_u:1082: anāpattir asya bhikṣoḥ (MSV IV 205) śayanāsanaguptyartham eva kurvataḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1085: sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavaty argalakaṃ datvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1098: tena khalu samayena dvayor ekapalāśikā upānahāḥ kriyante bhikṣūṇām uparatakānāṃ ca /
V03vinv05_u:1099: sa bhikṣur bhūyo bhūyaś carmakārasakāśam upasaṃkrāmati /
V03vinv05_u:1101: apareṇa samayena bhūyas tena gṛhapatinā sa bhikṣur dṛṣṭo 'nupānatkaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1103: ārya na tena śilpinā upānahā dattā /
V03vinv05_u:1104: gṛhapate na śrutaṃ tvayā durlabhaḥ śilpī satyajalpaka iti /
V03vinv05_u:1108: sa tena gṛhaṃ nītvā praṇītenāhāreṇa santarpya bahupuṭī upānahā dattā /
V03vinv05_u:1114: sa tām ādāya śastrakaṃ ca vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā utpāṭayitum ārabdhaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1115: (MSV IV 206) bhagavāṃś ca taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1118: mama ca bahupuṭī eva saṃpannā ekapuṭīṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyāmi /
V03vinv05_u:1120: dāsyanti batāmī śrāddhā gṛhapatayaḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ bahupuṭī upānahā tasmād anujānāmi bahupuṭī upānahā āgārikavinirmuktena kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1122: yad uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā bahupuṭī upānahā āgārikavinirmuktebhiḥ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1124: antata upālin sapta vāṣṭa vā padāni parimuktāni bhavanti /
V03vinv05_u:1126: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ evaṃrūpā upānahāḥ kriyante /
V03vinv05_u:1127: tadyathā hinihināyamānāḥ kiṇikiṇāyamānā meṇḍaviṣāṇikā bodhipaṭapatrakāḥ citropacitrāḥ paṃcakārṣāpaṇamūlyāḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1128: ṣaḍvargikair hi dṛṣṭo bhavati upānahā yāvat pidhāya te pārṣṇipādāṅguṣṭhena pāṭayitvā grīvāyāṃ mellayitvā gṛhṇantīdaṃ te dānaṃ cittālaṅkārāya /
V03vinv05_u:1136: tena dṛṣṭaḥ sa ekasmin gṛhe praviṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1138: sa tasmād gṛhān nirgatyāparaṃ gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1141: ārya kasyārthe tvaṃ māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1143: bhadramukha nāhaṃ tavopānahām apaharāmi tv ahaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi /
V03vinv05_u:1145: ārya hara vā mā vāpi tu yuṣmākaṃ sāmantakena śabdo visṛtaḥ - āryakā upanāhā harantīti /
V03vinv05_u:1148: yaḥ kaścid ādīnava iha bhikṣava evaṃrūpām upānahāṃ dhārayanti hinihinikā iti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1149: (91r = GBM 6.764) tasmān na bhikṣuṇā evaṃrūpā upānahā dhārayitavyā hinihinikā iti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1150: bhikṣur imām evaṃrūpām upānahāṃ dhārayati sātisāro bhavati /
V03vinv05_u:1152: tena khalu samayena bhikṣūṇām upānahābhiḥ pādapṛṣṭhe vraṇāni kṛtāni /
V03vinv05_u:1162: parvatam abhiruhatāṃ pādāṅguṣṭheṣu kṣatāni (MSV IV 208) bhavanti /
V03vinv05_u:1175: ṛkṣacarmam anujñātam ārā śastrī ca baddhikā //
V03vinv05_u:1188: yadā virūḍhakena mohapuruṣeṇa kāpilavāstavaḥ śākyāḥ praghātitāḥ tatra kecid uttarāpathaṃ gatāḥ kecid yāvan naivālaṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1206: yad uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā haimavateṣu janapadeṣu pūlā dhārayitavyā iti /
V03vinv05_u:1216: kim eṣa ānanda bhikṣor lubdhakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ (MSV IV 210) pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1220: yadi śatasahasram api labhati sarvaṃ praghātayati /
V03vinv05_u:1221: tasmād yadi lubdhako rikṣacarmānuprayacchati (91v = GBM 6.765) grahītavyam* /
V03vinv05_u:1228: yāvad asti mama kauśalaṃ yadi bhagavān anujānīyād granthayeyam* /
V03vinv05_u:1231: yasya kauśalaṃ vidyate tena pratigupte pradeśe sthitvā granthayitavyam* /
V03vinv05_u:1238: tasmād anujānāmi bhikṣuṇā ārā śastrakaṃ baddhikā ca dhārayitavyāḥ /
